name: Heavy Goods Gift Voucher
description:
The perfect gift for any writer, graff lover or general head. 

Vouchers can be sent via post or email - please specify your requirement when booking or email us at heavygoodsapparel@hotmail.co.uk 

The voucher can only be used once and it cannot be redeemed for cash.

If the voucher is lost replacements cannot be sent.

name: Heavy Goods Gift Voucher
description:
The perfect gift for any writer, graff lover or general head. 

Vouchers can be sent via post or email - please specify your requirement when booking or email us at heavygoodsapparel@hotmail.co.uk 

The voucher can only be used once and it cannot be redeemed for cash.

name: Heavy Goods Gift Voucher
description:
The perfect gift for any writer, graff lover or general head. 

Vouchers can be sent via post or email - please specify your requirement when booking or email us at heavygoodsapparel@hotmail.co.uk 

The voucher can only be used once and it cannot be redeemed for cash.

If the voucher is lost replacements cannot be sent.

name: Heavy Goods x Midas
description: We are very hype for this release... Heavy Goods managed to get the inter-rail spray paint machine that is Midas to be in the country long enough to design a Heavy Goods outline and it was definitely worth the wait. Screen printed in white on to a high quality heavy cotton bottle green hoody, this is our last drop for Xmas limited run never to be reprinted.

name: Not Guilty Magazine issue 9
description:
72 pages of UK, EURO and International Trains & Subways.
Portugals ALQ and REIS crew special.
England, Holland & Germany Focus.

A4 Full colour magazine & stickers.

name: Heavy Goods Logo crew neck sweaters
description: Back by popular demand!!! Our Heavy Goods logo designed by Mr Deus UKS makes another appearance this time on a black crew neck sweater with two variations to choose from. The white hollow 3d logo or the 2D Turquoise logo both extremely fresh if we do say so. Nothing more nothing less real threads for real heads. Team Heavy Goods. Each garment also comes with a Heavy Goods Sticker (as always).

name: Heavy Goods Bobble Hat (Black)
description:
New head gear from our Autumn/Winter 2013/14 collection.

A black bobble hat with white Heavy Goods label stitched onto the front.

A staple item for anyones wardrobe this season!

One size fits all.

name: Heavy Goods x Cruel ("Walls 'N' Bridges Steel 'N' Glass)
description:
Here it is the first release of our 2013/14 Autumn Winter collection, and what better way to start than with the self confessed graffiti junkie, train spotter and all round good dude Cruel. 

Cruel has designed us this very dope tee design "Walls 'N' Bridges Steel 'N' Glass his preferred surfaces he like to express his life on!

The crew neck tee is sports grey in colour & 100% cotton and has a 4 colour high quality screen print on front.

name: Graphotism Ewok Issue 57
description: Graphotism issue 57 features Ewok, Sofles, Pant and Nemo. In addition there are the usual mix of articles and hundreds of photos from around the world. 164 pages

name: Graphotism Revok Issue 49
description: Graphotism issue 49 features Revok, Mr Wany and Ogre. In addition there are the usual mix of articles and hundreds of photos from around the world. 164 pages

name: Keep The Faith Issue 2
description: Full of trains from the past and present, mainly from London and surrounding areas.

name: Keep The Faith, Issue 1.
description: Train Damage from all over UK & UK writers overseas. Featuring  interviews with Coma & Mira.

name: Heavy Goods x IcanOne
description: As you probably already know Heavy Goods is heavily influenced by the graffiti movement, so as a result of this we decided to hold a Heavy Goods outline competition on our Facebook page and the winning outline would get their design printed onto one of our t-shirts. So after receiving a load of dope outlines this one by "IcanOne" took first place, and we are happy to print this design up and have it for sale on our store. Enjoy and thanks to all you writers for your support!

name: Heavy Goods x Vaper (pacific blue)
description: Well here it is the long awaited collabo with the homie, writer & burner machine that is Mr.Vaper! The garment is 100% cotton contrast colour t-shirt with the main body in pure white and the arms and crew neck in pacific blue. The graphic is designed by Vaper and is a HEAVY font in a classic baseball jersey style with a sinister twist. The graphic on the t-shirt is a velvety material and really sets off the logo.. The last release of the Spring/Summer 13' Collection so stay fresh and rock the Heavy Goods.

name: Heavy Goods Vest (A Tribe Called Vest).
description: The fifth release of the Spring/Summer collection brings this black unisex vest with A Tribe Called Quest inspired pocket on the left hand side of the chest! The vest is 100% cotton and also has a Heavy Goods logo in the bottom right hand corner on the back in white. Keeping you cool in the summer in more ways than 1, courtesy of Heavy Goods Apparel.

name: Zoo Yorkshire (leopard print)
description: New Zoo Yorkshire T-shirt for the Spring/Summer 13' Collection. Soft ring spun cotton t-shirt in heather purple with a pocket on the left hand side of the chest in leopard print fabric, and on the right hand bottom corner on the back is a Zoo Yorkshire tag. "It's like a jungle sometimes"

name: Heavy Goods Snap Back (Black & Blue)
description:
Heavy Goods presents our first snap back from the Spring/Summer 13' Collection. 

The snap back has a black main body with shock blue brim, air holes & snap fastener. On the front is a white embroidered Heavy Goods logo. That hat also comes with a custom holographic Heavy Goods tonne logo sticker on the peak.

Heavy are the heads that wear the goods!!! 

*one size fits all*

name: Heavy Goods (Grey/Purple) Vest - available in men's & women's!
description:
The 2nd drop from the Spring/Summer '13 Collection.

The vest is sports grey ring spun cotton with a midnight purple Heavy Goods 'Deus' logo on the front and is available in men's and women's.

name: Heavy Goods Sticker Pack.
description:
Represent to the fullest with this sticker pack by Heavy Goods Apparel. 

Each pack contains 2 large Heavy Goods logo vinyl stickers, 2 large Zoo Yorkshire vinyl stickers, 1 Heavy Goods tonne logo vinyl sticker and a Heavy Goods decal sticker for your window/car etc.

***colours of stickers may vary***

name: Heavy Goods Camo (White)
description: The first release from our Spring/Summer 2013 collection starts off with a fresh white tee. On the front of the 100% heavy cotton white t-shirt is the Heavy Goods logo in a jungle camouflage print. Keeping you incognito in that concrete jungle!

name: Heavy Goods x Deus - Crew Neck Sweater (Grey)
description: Due to the popular demand of the burgundy crew neck sweater we did with London based Graffiti Artist/Illustrator 'DEUS', we have released a second colour way to keep yall happy and repping Heavy Goods. The sweater is cement grey in colour with the 'Deus' Heavy Goods design on the front and 'Deus' logo on the right lower forearm both in crisp white. Each garment also comes with a Heavy Goods Sticker (as always).

name: Zoo Yorkshire Beanie (Black)
description:
The second release for the heads.. literately!!! Keep ya nogin warm this winter with the second head-wear release from Heavy Goods Apparel, the Zoo Yorkshire black turn up beanie.

One size fits all.

Heavy are the heads that wear the goods!!!

name: Heavy Goods x Deus - Crew Neck Sweater Burgundy
description: The third instalment from our Winter 2012/2013 range, brings this uber kool collaboration with London based Graffiti Artist/Illustrator 'DEUS'. The sweater is burgundy in colour with the 'Deus' Heavy Goods design on the front and 'Deus' logo on the right lower forearm both in a smooth cream. Each garment also comes with a Heavy Goods Sticker (as always).

name: Heavy Goods Apparel (Rasta Logo)
description: Straight up Heavy Goods Apparel tonne logo with a colourful summer twist on the font of this 100% heavy cotton t-shirt! Something to keep you cool in the summer sun! Keep it Heavy Goods this summer!

name: My Uzi Weighs A Tonne
description: WE RUGGED NEVER SMOOTH!! Heavy Goods Apparel brings you the 'My Uzi Weighs A Tonne' t-shirt. The tee comes in two colour ways White on Black or Black on White. On the back bottom corner of the t-shirt is the Heavy Goods Apparel logo. Keep it hardcore and rock dem Heavy Goods! SMALL-XXL £15

name: Heavy Goods Apparel (Puns1 Script Logo Black)
description: The first artist collaboration by Heavy Goods Apparel brings you a Tattoo/Graffiti artist from the sunny sea side town of Scarborough"PUNS 1"... Puns brings the heat on this design with a smooth script font! 100% black cotton tee with a chrome script logo on the front and on the bottom right hand corner of the t-shirts is a very slick Puns One Script Signature. Stay Fresh.. Stay Heavy Goods Apparel!

name: Heavy Goods Apparel (Puns1 Script Logo White)
description: The first artist collaboration by Heavy Goods Apparel brings you a Tattoo/Graffiti artist from the sunny sea side town of Scarborough"PUNS 1"... Puns brings the heat on this design with a smooth script font! 100% white cotton tee with a black script logo on the front and on the bottom right hand corner of the t-shirts is a very slick Puns One Script Signature. Stay Fresh.. Stay Heavy Goods Apparel!

name: Heavy Goods Apparel (Puns1 Script Logo Red)
description: The first artist collaboration by Heavy Goods Apparel brings you a Tattoo/Graffiti artist from the sunny sea side town of Scarborough"PUNS 1"... Puns brings the heat on this design with a smooth script font! 100% red cotton tee with a white script logo on the front and on the bottom right hand corner of the t-shirts is a very slick Puns One Script Signature. Stay Fresh.. Stay Heavy Goods Apparel!

name: Heavy Goods Apparel (Puns1 Script Logo Purple)
description: The first artist collaboration by Heavy Goods Apparel brings you a Tattoo/Graffiti artist from the sunny sea side town of Scarborough"PUNS 1"... Puns brings the heat on this design with a smooth script font! 100% purple cotton tee with a white script logo on the front and on the bottom right hand corner of the t-shirts is a very slick Puns One Script Signature. Stay Fresh.. Stay Heavy Goods Apparel!

name: Network Bail
description: One for the heads who are locked down on bail or have to bail just to express their art and themselves, there are greater crimes out there and custodial sentences for graffiti writers don't work!! Stay up and hold it down! Autumn/Winter 2012

name: FU*K THE BUFF" Canvas Bag.
description:
Heavy Goods presents the "FU*K THE BUFF" Canvas Bag.

The bag has short handles is made from 100% recycled cotton and is the perfect size to carry up to 6 chrome burner 600ml cans.

This bag is dedicated to all those heads in NYC who in 1978 lost FULL COLOUR whole cars to the buff! 

But remember a bag is for life not just for spray paint!!

name: Zoo Yorkshire Beanie (Burgundy)
description:
One for the heads.. literately!!! Keep ya nogin warm this winter with the first head-wear release from Heavy Goods Apparel, the Zoo Yorkshire burgundy turn up beanie.

One size fits all.

Heavy are the heads that wear the goods!!!

name: Zoo Yorkshire (Jader Green)
description: Heavy Goods Apparel REPRESENTING the home turf of Yorkshire with the Zoo Yorkshire t-shirt. 100% cotton Jader Green t-shirt with custom graffiti 'Zoo Yorkshire' hand style on front in black.

name: Zoo Yorkshire T-Shirt (Black)
description: Heavy Goods Apparel REPRESENTING the home turf of Yorkshire with the Zoo Yorkshire T shirt. 100% cotton black t-shirt with custom graffiti 'Zoo Yorkshire' hand style on front in white and on the nape of neck is the Heavy Goods Apparel tonne logo also in white. This t-shirt comes with a FREE 'Zoo Yorkshire' vinyl sticker.

name: Zoo Yorkshire T-Shirt (White)
description: Heavy Goods Apparel REPRESENTING the home turf of Yorkshire with the Zoo Yorkshire t-shirt. 100% cotton white t-shirt with custom graffiti 'Zoo Yorkshire' hand style on front in black and on the nape of neck is the Heavy Goods Apparel tonne logo also in black.

name: Zoo Yorkshire T-Shirt (Black & Blue)
description: Heavy Goods Apparel REPRESENTING the home turf of Yorkshire with the Zoo Yorkshire t-shirt. 100% cotton black t-shirt with custom graffiti 'Zoo Yorkshire' hand style on front in light blue and on the nape of neck is the Heavy Goods Apparel tonne logo also in light blue.

name: Zoo Yorkshire T-Shirt (Red)
description: Heavy Goods Apparel REPRESENTING the home turf of Yorkshire with the Zoo Yorkshire t-shirt. 100% cotton red t-shirt with custom graffiti 'Zoo Yorkshire' hand style on the front in white and on the nape of neck is the Heavy Goods Apparel tonne logo also in white.

name: Zoo Yorkshire Hoody (Pink)
description: Girls Girls Girls Girls, Girls we do adore!!!! Some Zoo Yorkshire heat for the lady's to represent! Wrap up this winter in style in this pink hoody with Zoo Yorkshire logo on the front in white.

name: Zoo Yorkshire Hoody (Black,unisex)
description: A HEAVY weight black hoody with fresh new Zoo Yorkshire design on the front, LIMITED so grab one while stocks last!! Stay warm this winter stay HEAVY GOODS APPAREL! Represent Represent!
